ratings.comment: Such an disappointment of a teacher. She proudly announces a 65% test average across multiple classes—clearly, her methods aren't working. She talks way too fast, over-explains, and rushes ahead, answering for students before they can speak. Her tests are absurdly long, full of curveballs, and cram in four units. Please avoid this terrible woman.
Literally Gives me -0.05 and sometime -0.02 off of most of my answers for not being specific enough.

super easy grader. gives partial credit. shows you exactly what you need to know to pass quizzes and tests. tests are super easy if you do all the practice problems. kept a high A entire class. your lack of success is due to your own laziness. I have a baby, a full time job , full time student and was still able to get an A. No excuses!

Marissa was wonderful! As long as you go to every class, and keep up with the homework/material you should do fine! Completing practice exams is a must to succeed on tests. She makes herself available for help if you ask for it. Her organized system makes it easier to learn the material. No surprises on expectations or tests - very clear & concise

Bad teacher. Its super funny when she tries to calm down the class, because none of the students have any respect for her due to her super boring teaching methods. She was especially unhelpful/useless during the pH calculations. Avoid if possible
Terrible prof. Her exams were too long and tricky to do well. She also couldn't do the demos properly so just quit using any altogether. She doesn't seem to be cut out to be a teacher.
Extremely boring and poor teacher. She had trouble controlling the class and took more time making her handwriting on the board look pretty than actually doing examples and explaining things.

She is a great person and a great professor. Some people jumped down her throat if she made a simple typo or something, but shealways recognized her mistakes right away and she was patient and polite when dealing with these rude students. She really knew what she was talking about and made an effort to make resources available to us.

She writes everything on the board which is nice so you don't really have to pay attention to her since it is pretty difficult because she is so boring. Makes a lot of mistakes when writing on the board. Tests aren't too bad if you do the practice ones but if not then you are pretty much screwed since they are really long for the allowed time.

She's new, but people are way too hard on her.  She writes everything on the board, but it helps if you didn't hear what she said.  Sometimes she goes too slow, but it makes everything easy to understand.  I learned much more in this class than in 103.  Do the practice exams and her test will be fine.  I wouldn't think twice about having her again

Hw is based on effort which is good.  class is boring and she writes word for word...however, class moves at a very slow pace and she explains everything.  If asked she will repeat so its eazy to understand the concepts etc... test/quiz questions are fair if u look at the notes you take during class.  Okay professor overall and understandable

Dr. Rosen is the most terrible teacher I have ever had.  Her lectures are the extremely boring and monotonous.  Her exams are too long for the time allotted. She has only done three demonstrations the entire year, and they were extremely ineffective.  Avoid this woman at all costs.

One of the worst professors/teachers I've ever had.  She writes every single word she says on the board, and I mean every single word.  Never teaches the quiz material before we actually have to take the quiz.  Often writes test questions about topics she has never mention in class.  Refuses to admit she's screwed up even when everyone fail. AVOID!

She is not a very effective teacher. She is very monotone when she speaks and doesn't like to be corrected or challenged. I'm pretty sure she's only done 2 demonstrations the entire semester...and they were not interesting at all.

Dr. Rosen knows what she is talking about. Aside from that, she is the single most boring and monotone professor I've ever had the displeasure of taking. On top of that, she constantly makes calculation mistakes and was completely useless the 1 time I asked for help. You'll have more fun watching water evaporate.

Horrible teacher. She makes board mistakes almost every day and doesn't do any experiments that Shakashiri hasn't done. Her weekly quizzes are based on information we learn the week after the quiz is due. All she does is copy notes and problems from the book and place them on the board.
Tests are pretty fair.  She tends to schedule labs about one week before you actually learn the material.  She makes a plethra of mistakes on the board. Ehh.

Makes a lot of mistakes on the board, but also writes down everything she says on the board. It is helpful that she writes everything down but this class seems to drag on forever every day. Tests are difficult and you definitely need to be well prepared for them. Also, super weak experiments, nothing compared to Shakashiri's.
